EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up From MBO (1342642601.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi David, It was so nice talking with you today. I asked around to see if MBO had anyone we could refer in terms of international licensing and secrecy agreements and unfortunately this just not something we familiarity with. I wish you the best of luck and please let me know if there is anything else we may be able to help you with. Thanks for connecting!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
